scripts.build: npm run build1 && npm run build2 && npm run build3
scripts.build1: cd packages/ion4-ng8 && npx ng build --base-href=/ion4-ng8/ --prod && echo '/* /index.html 200' >> www/_redirects
scripts.build2: cd packages/ion5-ng8 && npx ng build --base-href=/ion5-ng8/ --prod && echo '/* /index.html 200' >> www/_redirects
scripts.build3: cd packages/ion5-ng9_Ivy && npx ng build --base-href=/ion5-ng9_ivy/ --prod && echo '/* /index.html 200' >> www/_redirects
scripts.publish: cp -r -f packages/ion4-ng8/www www/ion4-ng8 && cp -r -f packages/ion5-ng8/www www/ion5-ng8 && cp -r -f packages/ion5-ng9_Ivy/www www/ion5-ng9_ivy
